nodes.name: MutableShort
nodes.comment:
* A mutable short wrapper. *

* Note that as MutableShort does not extend Short, it is not treated by String.format as a Short parameter. * * @see Short * @since 2.1 * @version $Id$

* Required for serialization support.
     * 
     * @see java.io.Serializable
The mutable value.
* Constructs a new MutableShort with the default value of zero.

* Constructs a new MutableShort with the specified value.
     * 
     * @param value  the initial value to store

* Constructs a new MutableShort with the specified value.
     * 
     * @param value  the initial value to store, not null
     * @throws NullPointerException if the object is null

* Constructs a new MutableShort parsing the given string.
     * 
     * @param value  the string to parse, not null
     * @throws NumberFormatException if the string cannot be parsed into a short
     * @since 2.5

* Gets the value as a Short instance.
     * 
     * @return the value as a Short, never null

* Sets the value.
     * 
     * @param value  the value to set

* Sets the value from any Number instance.
     * 
     * @param value  the value to set, not null
     * @throws NullPointerException if the object is null

* Increments the value.
     *
     * @since Commons Lang 2.2

* Decrements the value.
     *
     * @since Commons Lang 2.2

* Adds a value to the value of this instance.
     * 
     * @param operand  the value to add, not null
     * @since Commons Lang 2.2

* Adds a value to the value of this instance.
     * 
     * @param operand  the value to add, not null
     * @throws NullPointerException if the object is null
     * @since Commons Lang 2.2

* Subtracts a value from the value of this instance.
     * 
     * @param operand  the value to subtract, not null
     * @since Commons Lang 2.2

* Subtracts a value from the value of this instance.
     * 
     * @param operand  the value to subtract, not null
     * @throws NullPointerException if the object is null
     * @since Commons Lang 2.2

* Returns the value of this MutableShort as a short.
     *
     * @return the numeric value represented by this object after conversion to type short.

* Returns the value of this MutableShort as an int.
     *
     * @return the numeric value represented by this object after conversion to type int.

* Returns the value of this MutableShort as a long.
     *
     * @return the numeric value represented by this object after conversion to type long.

* Returns the value of this MutableShort as a float.
     *
     * @return the numeric value represented by this object after conversion to type float.

* Returns the value of this MutableShort as a double.
     *
     * @return the numeric value represented by this object after conversion to type double.

* Gets this mutable as an instance of Short.
     *
     * @return a Short instance containing the value from this mutable, never null

* Compares this object to the specified object. The result is true if and only if the argument * is not null and is a MutableShort object that contains the same short * value as this object. * * @param obj the object to compare with, null returns false * @return true if the objects are the same; false otherwise.

* Returns a suitable hash code for this mutable.
     * 
     * @return a suitable hash code

* Compares this mutable to another in ascending order.
     * 
     * @param other  the other mutable to compare to, not null
     * @return negative if this is less, zero if equal, positive if greater

* Returns the String value of this mutable.
     * 
     * @return the mutable value as a string
